languages.text: "И последнее, Ваша Светлость. Ваше посвящение в предержатели священного Патента — лишь вопрос времени, и я бы хотел уточнить важную деталь. Думаю, вы поддержите многовековую традицию, скрепленную не менее продолжительной дружбой — традицию представления вас на Даргонусе одним из дворянских родов. Полагаю, как и до этого, таким домом станет род Драйвстемов..."

traits.locale_text: "И последнее, ваша светлость. Ваше посвящение в предержатели священного Патента — лишь вопрос времени, и я бы хотел уточнить важную деталь. Думаю, вы поддержите многовековую традицию, скрепленную не менее продолжительной дружбой — традицию представления вас на Даргонусе одним из дворянских родов. Полагаю, как и до этого, таким домом станет род Драйвстемов..."

languages.text: "And one last thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your inauguration as bearer of the sacred Warrant is but a matter of time, and I would like to enquire about one crucial detail. I imagine you are intending to uphold the centuries-old tradition, bolstered by an equally long-lasting friendship, of being represented on Dargonus by one of the noble houses. I presume that, as before, this duty will be accorded to House Drivestem—"
languages.original_text: "И последнее, Ваша Светлость. Ваше посвящение в предержатели священного Патента — лишь вопрос времени, и я бы хотел уточнить важную деталь. Думаю, вы поддержите многовековую традицию, скрепленную не менее продолжительной дружбой — традицию представления вас на Даргонусе одним из дворянских родов. Полагаю, как и до этого, таким домом станет род Драйвстемов..."

traits.locale_text: "And one last thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your initiation into the position of the bearer of the sacred Warrant is but a matter of time, and I would like to inquire about one crucial detail. I imagine you are going to support the centuries-old tradition bolstered by a just as long-lasting friendship — the tradition of having Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} represented on Dargonus by one of the noble houses. I suppose that, as before, this duty will be assigned to House Drivestem..."

"And one last thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your initiation into the position of the bearer of the sacred Warrant is but a matter of time, and I would like to inquire about one crucial detail. I imagine you are going to support the centuries-old tradition bolstered by a just as long-lasting friendship — the tradition of having Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} represented on Dargonus by one of the noble houses. I suppose that, as before, this duty will be assigned to House Drivestem..."

"And one last thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your inauguration as bearer of the sacred Warrant is but a matter of time, and I would like to inquire about one crucial detail. I imagine you are intending to uphold the centuries-old tradition, bolstered by an equally long-lasting friendship, of being represented on Dargonus by one of the noble houses. I presume that, as before, this duty will be accorded to House Drivestem—"

"And one last thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your inauguration as bearer of the sacred Warrant is but a matter of time, and I would like to inquire about one crucial detail. I imagine you are intending to uphold the centuries-old tradition, bolstered by an equally long-lasting friendship, of being represented on Dargonus by one of the noble houses. I presume that, as before, this duty will be accorded to House Drivestem—"

"And one last thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your inauguration as bearer of the sacred Warrant is but a matter of time, and I would like to inquire about one crucial detail. I imagine you are intending to uphold the centuries-old tradition, bolstered by an equally long-lasting friendship, of being represented on Dargonus by one of the noble houses. I presume that, as before, this duty will be accorded to House Drivestem—"

languages.text: “还有最后一件事情，大人。您是神圣授状的持有者，就职典礼迟早都要举行。我想询问某个典礼的细节。我猜想，您可能会愿意遵守数百年来的传统，基于同样长久的友好往来，选择达戈努斯的某个贵族家族作为您的代表。我在想，这里可以与以往一样，由德莱夫斯塔家族来承担这一职责——”
languages.original_text: "And one last thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your inauguration as bearer of the sacred Warrant is but a matter of time, and I would like to enquire about one crucial detail. I imagine you are intending to uphold the centuries-old tradition, bolstered by an equally long-lasting friendship, of being represented on Dargonus by one of the noble houses. I presume that, as before, this duty will be accorded to House Drivestem—"

traits.locale_text: “还有最后一件事情，大人。您是神圣许可证的持有者，就职典礼迟早都要举行。我想询问某个典礼的细节。我猜想，您可能会愿意遵守数百年来的传统，基于同样长久的友好往来，选择达戈努斯的某个贵族家族作为您的代表。我在想，这里可以与以往一样，由德莱夫斯塔家族来承担这一职责——”

languages.text: «Una cosa más, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Su inauguración como portador{mf||a} de la sagrada Patente es cuestión de tiempo, pero hay un detalle crucial por el que debo preguntar: imagino que tiene intención de mantener la tradición centenaria, apoyada por una amistad igualmente longeva, de que una de las casas nobles de Dargonus le represente en el planeta. ¿Puedo suponer que, como hasta ahora, el honor le será concedido a la casa Drivestem... ?».
languages.original_text: "And one last thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your inauguration as bearer of the sacred Warrant is but a matter of time, and I would like to enquire about one crucial detail. I imagine you are intending to uphold the centuries-old tradition, bolstered by an equally long-lasting friendship, of being represented on Dargonus by one of the noble houses. I presume that, as before, this duty will be accorded to House Drivestem—"

traits.locale_text: «Una cosa más, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Su inauguración como portador{mf||a} de la sagrada Patente es cuestión de tiempo, pero hay un detalle crucial por el que debo preguntar: imagino que tiene intención de mantener la tradición centenaria, apoyada por una amistad igualmente longeva, de que una de las casas nobles de Dargonus le represente en el planeta. ¿Puedo suponer que, como hasta ahora, el honor le será concedido a la casa Drivestem... ?».

languages.text: 「最後にひとつだけ、陛下。聖なる令状の保持者であるあなたの就任式は近日中に執り行われますが、大事なことをお聞きしたく存じます。あなたは何世紀にもわたる伝統を、伝統と同じくらい長く続く友好関係を築いたダルゴナスを代表する貴族家系に支えられながら、お守りするつもりでしょう。以前と同様、この責務はドライブステム家に与えられるものと推測しますが―」
languages.original_text: "And one last thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your inauguration as bearer of the sacred Warrant is but a matter of time, and I would like to enquire about one crucial detail. I imagine you are intending to uphold the centuries-old tradition, bolstered by an equally long-lasting friendship, of being represented on Dargonus by one of the noble houses. I presume that, as before, this duty will be accorded to House Drivestem—"

traits.locale_text: 「最後にひとつだけ、陛下。聖なる令状の保持者であるあなたの就任式は近日中に執り行われますが、大事なことをお聞きしたく存じます。あなたは何世紀にもわたる伝統を、伝統と同じくらい長く続く友好関係を築いたダルゴナスを代表する貴族家系に支えられながら、お守りするつもりでしょう。以前と同様、この責務はドライブステム家に与えられるものと推測しますが―」

languages.text: "Und eine letzte Sache noch, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Eure Amtseinführung als {mf|Träger|Trägerin} des heiligen Handelsbriefs ist nur eine Frage der Zeit, und ich hätte da eine Frage zu einem wichtigen Detail. Ich nehme an, Ihr wollt die jahrhundertalte Tradition aufrechterhalten, die auf einer ebenso langlebigen Freundschaft basiert und besagt, dass Ihr auf Dargonus von einem der Adelshäuser repräsentiert werdet. Und ich nehme weiterhin an, dass diese Pflicht wie bisher dem Haus Drivestem zugesprochen wird ..."
languages.original_text: "And one last thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your inauguration as bearer of the sacred Warrant is but a matter of time, and I would like to enquire about one crucial detail. I imagine you are intending to uphold the centuries-old tradition, bolstered by an equally long-lasting friendship, of being represented on Dargonus by one of the noble houses. I presume that, as before, this duty will be accorded to House Drivestem—"

traits.locale_text: "Und eine letzte Sache noch, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Eure Amtseinführung als {mf|Träger|Trägerin} des heiligen Handelsbriefs ist nur eine Frage der Zeit, und ich hätte da eine Frage zu einem wichtigen Detail. Ich nehme an, Ihr wollt die jahrhundertalte Tradition aufrechterhalten, die auf einer ebenso langlebigen Freundschaft basiert und besagt, dass Ihr auf Dargonus von einem der Adelshäuser repräsentiert werdet. Und ich nehme weiterhin an, dass diese Pflicht wie bisher dem Haus Drivestem zugesprochen wird ..."

languages.text: « Encore une chose, Votre Seigneurie. Votre investiture en tant que {mf|gardien|gardienne} de la lettre de marque sacrée n'est qu'une question de temps, et je voudrais aborder avec vous un détail de la plus haute importance. J'imagine que vous voudrez perpétuer la tradition séculaire, renforcée par une profonde et indéfectible amitié, d'être {mf|représenté|représentée} sur Dargonus par l'une des maisons nobles. Je présume également que vous attribuerez de nouveau ce devoir à la maison Drivestem... »
languages.original_text: "And one last thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your inauguration as bearer of the sacred Warrant is but a matter of time, and I would like to enquire about one crucial detail. I imagine you are intending to uphold the centuries-old tradition, bolstered by an equally long-lasting friendship, of being represented on Dargonus by one of the noble houses. I presume that, as before, this duty will be accorded to House Drivestem—"

traits.locale_text: « Encore une chose, Votre Seigneurie. Votre investiture en tant que {mf|gardien|gardienne} de la lettre de marque sacrée n'est qu'une question de temps, et je voudrais aborder avec vous un détail de la plus haute importance. J'imagine que vous voudrez perpétuer la tradition séculaire, renforcée par une profonde et indéfectible amitié, d'être {mf|représenté|représentée} sur Dargonus par l'une des maisons nobles. Je présume également que vous attribuerez de nouveau ce devoir à la maison Drivestem... »

languages.text: "Bir şey daha var {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin hamili olarak göreve başlama töreniniz eli kulağında, benim de hayati bir detay konusunu size danışmam gerek. Tahminimce yüzyıllardır süregelen geleneği devam ettirmek ve Dargonus'ta soylu hanelerden biri tarafından temsil edilerek aynı derecede uzun süren bu dostluğu pekiştirmek istiyorsunuzdur. Daha önce olduğu gibi bu vazife için Drivestem Hanesi'ni uygun göreceğinizi varsay..."
languages.original_text: "And one last thing, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your inauguration as bearer of the sacred Warrant is but a matter of time, and I would like to enquire about one crucial detail. I imagine you are intending to uphold the centuries-old tradition, bolstered by an equally long-lasting friendship, of being represented on Dargonus by one of the noble houses. I presume that, as before, this duty will be accorded to House Drivestem—"

traits.locale_text: "Bir şey daha var {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin taşıyıcısı olarak göreve başlama töreninizin gerçekleşmesi yalnızca zaman meselesi ve hayati bir detay konusunda size danışmam gerek. Tahminimce yüzyıllardır süregelen geleneği devam ettirmek ve Dargonus'ta soylu hanelerden biri tarafından temsil edilerek aynı derecede uzun süren bu dostluğu pekiştirmek istiyorsunuzdur. Daha önce olduğu gibi bu vazife için Drivestem Hanesi'ni uygun göreceğinizi varsay..."
